depositERC721Token(address,address,uint2.details: The caller must allow the portal to withdraw the token      from their account beforehand.

params._L1data: Additional data to be interpreted by L1                (forwarded to the ERC-721 token contract)
params._L2data: Additional data to be interpreted by L2
params._tokenId: The identifier of the NFT being transferred

depositERC721Token(address,address,uint2.notice: Transfer an ERC-721 token to a DApp and add an input to         the DApp's input box to signal such operation.

getInputBox().notice: Get the input box used by this portal
